divs: sighting detailsat approximately 4:55 pm on 2\7\07, i was travelling eastbound on i-88, near naperville road. in front of me i saw a brown, rectangular object crossing the sky at approximately a 50 degree angle. i would have estimated its distance as a couple miles away. it was moving in a north to south direction. my initial thought was that it was one of those banners that is dragged behind an airplane as an advertisement, but i could not see an airplane ahead of it. i don't think i was the only one who saw it, because another driver actually stopped his car and was following the object as it continued to move south. as i continued east, the object continued west, and i bot a back view of it, and it seemed triangluar in its back, kind of like a giant wedge. the skin seemed to flutter like cloth. i am reasonably sure that this probably has a sensible explanation for it.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Naperville
There were no other sightings in Naperville on or around February 7th 2007
